text: Itte yaru ga i. `Arra no omoto no oho de, sore yori mo warui mono o, anata gata ni tsugeyou ka. Sore wa arra ga mihanashita mono, o ikari o hi mutta-sha, saru matawa buta to sa reta mono, soshite yokoshima kaminitsukaeru-sha, kare-ra wa, aku no kyochi ni ori,(tadashi) michi kara toku mayoi satta-sha-tachi de aru
